attributes.action: change the smoking ban to allow private smoking rooms if only smokers use them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The smoking ban treats people who smoke as pariahs. They are treated as second class citizens and as this country is a democracy why was there not a public vote in bringing it in?
It is unfair that people cannot use private smoking rooms when prisoners who are being punished are still allowed to smoke inside.
